mapper.insert: insert into member_user (user_id, user_pw, user_name, user_gender, user_birth, user_phoneNum, user_address, user_email) values (#{user_id}, #{user_pw}, #{user_name}, #{user_gender}, #{user_birth}, #{user_phoneNum}, #{user_address}, #{user_email})
insert into member_com (com_id, com_pw, com_name, com_phoneNum, com_address, com_email) values (#{com_id}, #{com_pw}, #{com_name}, #{com_phoneNum}, #{com_address}, #{com_email})
mapper.select: select user_id from member_user where user_id = #{user_id}
select com_id from member_com where com_id = #{com_id}
